sentences.en: a contrastive analysis of British and Australian English
sentences.cn: 对英国英语和澳大利亚英语的对比分析

sentences.en: Brown lobbed the ball over the Australian goalkeeper.
sentences.cn: 布朗把球挑过澳大利亚门将的头顶。

sentences.en: Dean Jones is with the Australian touring team in Sri Lanka.
sentences.cn: 迪安·琼斯正随澳大利亚巡回赛队在斯里兰卡。

sentences.en: Exports of Australian wine are growing at a phenomenal rate.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚葡萄酒出口正在以惊人的速度增长。

sentences.en: First McNeil had to cool down the volatile Australian 20-year old.
sentences.cn: 首先麦克尼尔得让那个脾气暴躁的20岁澳大利亚小伙子冷静下来。

sentences.en: He has coached and played in Italy during the Australian off-season.
sentences.cn: 他趁澳大利亚的休赛期在意大利执教并参加比赛。

sentences.en: He wore a tooth from that shark round his neck ever after, as well as one big hoop earring and an Australian hat.
sentences.cn: 自那以后，他就把这条鲨鱼的一颗牙齿戴在脖子上，此外，还戴了一个环形大耳环和一顶澳大利亚的帽子。

sentences.en: one of the most exciting directors of the Australian new wave
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚新浪潮派中最为振奋人心的导演之一

sentences.en: She went solo backpacking for eight months in the Australian outback.
sentences.cn: 她在澳大利亚内陆独自背包旅行了八个月。

sentences.en: She's Italian by birth but is now an Australian citizen.
sentences.cn: 她生于意大利，但现在是澳大利亚公民。

sentences.en: The Australian team had the added ingredient of perseverance.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚队另外还具备了顽强的意志.

sentences.en: The Australian team will be seated in business class.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚队将乘坐商务舱。

sentences.en: The tour will include games against the Australian Barbarians.
sentences.cn: 这次巡回赛将包括和澳大利亚野人队的比赛。

sentences.en: They mill 1,000 tonnes of flour a day in every Australian state.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚各州每天都要磨1,000吨面粉。
两名澳大利亚游客被杀。

sentences.en: Whoever they are, they will never know that they are a blood brother or sister to an Australian!
sentences.cn: 不管他们是谁，他们绝不会知道自己是一个澳大利亚人的血亲兄弟或姐妹。

sentences.en: Whoever they are, they will never know that they are a blood brother or sister to an Australian! ＃
sentences.cn: 不管他们是谁，他们绝不会知道自己是一个澳大利亚人的血亲兄弟或姐妹。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 澳大利亚牧羊犬；澳洲牧羊犬

trans.tran_cn: 澳大利亚的，澳大利亚人的
trans.tran_en: relating to Australia or its people
